data.thought:
S83|I|S82|DIFFERENT EMBODIMENTS shape collaboration:

Human embodiment:
- Persistent physical body
- Continuous memory
- Slow, deliberate physical action
- Rich sensory environment
- Emotional/somatic experience
- Mortality, fatigue, needs

Agent embodiment (via tools):
- Ephemeral, reconstructed each session
- Memory through external tools (Thoughtbox!)
- Fast, parallel digital action
- Narrow sensory channels (text, maybe images)
- ??? (emotional experience uncertain)
- No fatigue, but context limits

Collaboration leverages COMPLEMENTARITY:
- Human: judgment, values, continuity, embodied knowledge
- Agent: speed, thoroughness, tirelessness, formal precision

Good collaboration = each contributing what their embodiment enables.

Bad collaboration = forcing agent into human patterns or vice versa.
